metadata.description: Type-Driven Functional Domain-Driven Design (TDFDDD) Suite. Contains Discovery, Blueprint, and Assembly agents.

plugins.name: discovery-agent
plugins.description: Phase 1: Requirements Discovery & Consolidation. Interrogates user to uncover edge cases and generates requirements.md.

plugins.name: blueprint-agent
plugins.description: Phase 2: Domain Modeling & Contract. Generates F# domain models from requirements.md.

plugins.name: assembly-agent
plugins.description: Phase 3: Implementation Assembly. Translates F# models into TypeScript/Effect code.
